main event: An Air Force pilot observed a round, reddish object pulsating in the sky over Victorville, California at approximately 1930 hrs on February 7, 1953.
interesting points: The object was round, reddish in color and illuminated,The object appeared to pulsate or emit flashes of light,It was estimated to be 20-30 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes before the object disappeared,The incident was investigated by the United States Air Force as part of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a round, reddish object emitting bright white light
witness description: an experienced Air Force pilot airborne in an F-86 jet aircraft
